topics.body:
I want to give out mad props for my Brother today.

I didn't know he was going to do this but he *FINISHED THE WHOLE DAMN MODEL TODAY*

*EXTRA ATTACHMENT PIECES AND EVERYTHING*

*HE LITERALLY SPENT A WHOLE 24 HOURS FUCKING HOURS MAKING THIS, _24 DAMN HOURS_*

I love you Bro.

"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552b4b886368721052800800#post_552b4b886368721052800800
He's made a lot of Model Kits like this in the past.

Its been over a DECADE since he's made one of these and I asked for help and he just did the entire thing.

I feel guilty cuz I really didn't do much of anything because all the pieces were tiny and fragile.

*He had to file these things down with a nail filer because some of the joint were too fat*

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552b494c6368721052b80500#post_552b494c6368721052b80500
[bq="Too_Offensive"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552b480763687259e6fd0f00#post_552b480763687259e6fd0f00
Again, super okay with this. Better to do ourselves in via progress than via nuclear explosions. 

Or worse, apathy
Imagine the whole world becomes Japan on steroids and nobody wants to breed
For every baby there are 100 people over 50
That would be the most anticlimactic extinction ever. 
I mean I think it's unlikely to happen considering how many soccer moms with several broods of children I see at wal mart but still[/bq]
I can think of worse ways we can do ourselves in.

We all eventually becoming Reploids or such is far from the worst case scenario.


One of the worst case scenarios:
Biomechantronics fails; ectogenesis succeeds.
Imagine just mass production factories of children being born from vats, raised in mass production factories, taught the same thing, hundreds of thousands of individuals sharing the same genetic code.  No more children born naturally.  No more thing such as mothers or fathers.  The second a naturally born person that looks different walks on the street people freak the ever living fuck out at start screaming at you in horror and everyone immediately runs away hiding from you at the sight of seeing someone looking natural to the point everyone's trampling each other over thinking that you have some sort of contagious disease.
"Oh god!  A natural!  I hear they have cancer!  Quick!  Everyone run away before you catch it!"
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552b4d6f636872700d390300#post_552b4d6f636872700d390300
It feels waited.

And The joints and parts are stiff enough you shouldn't worry moving it around. 

Its pretty sturdy. And the pieces the are detachable are easily able to be detached and put back on. 

Also it was *300 pieces* 

Some of the problems we had were that some joint pieces were too fat and needed to be filed down.
